Cytokine Storm.description: A life-threatening immune response characterized by excessive cytokine production

Excessive Immune Response.description: Overactivation of the immune system leading to widespread inflammation

Infection/Inflammation.description: Underlying trigger for cytokine storm, often viral or bacterial

Tissue Damage.description: Damage to tissues caused by excessive inflammation

Organ Failure.description: Failure of vital organs due to inflammation and damage

Vascular Leakage.description: Leakage of fluid from blood vessels into tissues

Edema.description: Accumulation of fluid in tissues causing swelling

Respiratory Distress.description: Difficulty breathing due to lung inflammation

Viral Infection.description: Viral infections can trigger cytokine storms

Bacterial Infection.description: Bacterial infections can trigger cytokine storms

Hypoxia.description: Low oxygen levels in the blood
